Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン、ステキな マフラーしてるのね！
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune, the muffler you're wearing is lovely!

Entry.JapaneseText: そう？ ありがとう、クレア。 クレアもおそろいにしてみない？
Entry.EnglishText: You think so? Thanks, Claire. Do you want to try wearing one too?

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、私も？ うーん、そうね…… 考えとくわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Um, me? Well, let's see... I'll think about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン…… クレアに変なものを勧めないでくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune, don't put weird ideas into Claire's head.
